title: New: Danny Brown – XXX
content:
Danny Brown’s music should come with a disclaimer; ‘likely to induce a temporary state of madness and/or schizophrenia’, would be a good start. His follow up to the utterly fucking crazy ‘Hybrid’ continues in the same eccentric, blissfully offensive vein.

Despite Brown’s awkward and borderline silly voice, he actually has a lot to say. The track, ‘Radio Song’, is quick witted and thumping comment on the state of hip-hop and black culture. For every line that invokes poignancy however, Brown turns the tables entirely, suggesting we “make Sarah Palin deep throat till she hiccups” is a particularly inedible highlight.

It’s this effortless ability to manipulate tone that makes XXX so inviting, it thrusts Brown‘s personality in a listeners’ face with such venom it’s impossible not to be won over, or at the very least have an opinion.
